Installation¶

Installing allesfitter¶

  • git clone https://github.com/MNGuenther/allesfitter into your PYTHONPATH.
  • git clone https://github.com/MNGuenther/exoworlds into your PYTHONPATH.
  • (soon to be pip-installable)

Requirements¶

Standard packages (install via conda/pip):

  • python (>=2.7 or >=3.5)
  • numpy
  • scikit-learn
  • matplotlib
  • h5py
  • seaborn
  • tqdm

Special packages (install via pip):

  • ellc (>=1.8.0) [1]
  • dynesty (>=0.9.2) [2]
  • emcee (>=3.0rc2) [3]
  • celerite (>=0.3.0) [4]
  • corner (>=2.0.1)

Footnotes

[1]requires a Fortran compiler; on Mac, you can install one e.g. via brew install gcc
[2]optional; for Nested Sampling
[3]optional; for MCMC
[4]optional; for Gaussian Processes
